entry.title: Old New Music: How Can I Make You Leave Her?

link.title: Old New Music: How Can I Make You Leave Her?

entry.content:
I realized I never shared this song on my blog. It's a track I released on April Fool's Day back in 2015.

The title is "How Can I Make You Leave Her?"

People who heard it were split into two very different groups: Some said it sounded hopeful, while others said it felt depressing.

So what was I trying to convey?
entry.summary: I realized I never shared this song on my blog. It's a track I released on April Fool's Day back in 2015. The title is "How Can I Make You Leave Her?"

entry.title: New Music: ANI
entry.content:
As some of my friends know, I write songs time to time. After a long artist's block, I finally finished this song…

Enjoy if you can….
entry.summary: As some of my friends know, I write songs time to time. After a long artist's block, I finally finished this song…

entry.title: Legendary Football Player, Dale Winners
entry.content:
I used to live in a townhouse with a very spacious basement, which my friends and I used to hangout, drink, do some random jams/recordings and sometimes work together. And this is one of the recordings we did… (or should I say Dale did because he's the only one doing all the voice acting?)

It's been in my HDD for the last 2 years, and I finally decided to edit it to show it to the world because it's hilarious. Enjoy
entry.summary: I used to live in a townhouse with a very spacious basement, which my friends and I used to hangout, drink, do some random jams/recordings and sometimes work together. And this is one of the recordings we did… (or should I say Dale did because he's the only one doing all the voice acting?)

entry.title: [WIP] Music: Out of Reach Intro
entry.content: This is something I wrote last night.. It's still intro to a song I, for now, call Out of Reach. I quite like it, so I might finish it one day.. yes one day…

entry.title: I Figured Out Wild and Free Chords

link.title: I Figured Out Wild and Free Chords

entry.content:
I have been trying to find the correct guitar chords for Wild and Free by Damian Rice for a while without any success. The closest one was this, but still not 100% correct.

So I just did it by myself…. Enjoy.. if you know how to play guitar and you are a fan of Damian Rice just like me. For lyrics, take a look at the above link. meh…

verse e - bm - c#m - g#m</span>

prechrous a - e - bm - c#m</span>

chrus f#m - c#m</span>

(Damian does a simple finger trick with the last c#m chord. Lift and press again fourth finger at the first time and then fifth finger at the 2nd time)
entry.summary: I have been trying to find the correct guitar chords for Wild and Free by Damian Rice for a while without any success. The closest one was this, but still not 100% correct.

entry.title: On a Windy Day
entry.content: Finally decided to post my music on YouTube.
entry.summary: Finally decided to post my music on YouTube.

entry.title: Wrote a Piece of Piano Music

link.title: Wrote a Piece of Piano Music

entry.content:
I have been always driven by moderate creativity, which have been realized in the form of music or writing. My recent retro-adventure is music. So I have been playing piano for about 3 months now and I wrote my first piano song (well first song in the last 10 years, to be precise). I'm pretty happy with it, and people around me like it a lot too.

I'll try to upload it one day once all the minor modifications I'm adding are finalized.

Update:

So finally I uploaded it.
entry.summary: I have been always driven by moderate creativity, which have been realized in the form of music or writing. My recent retro-adventure is music. So I have been playing piano for about 3 months now and I wrote my first piano song (well first song in the last 10 years, to be precise). I'm pretty happy with it, and people around me like it a lot too.
